post.summary: Create a new calendar meeting event.
post.description: Create a new calendar event and meeting object by providing the necessary details such as associations, email reminders, meeting object properties, and timezone.

parameters.name: organizerUserId
parameters.description: The HubSpot user that will be treated as the creator of the meeting event

get.description: Get a paged list meeting scheduling pages

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Retrieve scheduling pages with a specified name.

parameters.name: organizerUserId
parameters.description: Filter the response to scheduling pages created by the specified user.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter the response to the specific type of meeting.

post.description: Book a meeting for a specified meeting page.

get.summary: Get the availability for a meeting
get.description: Get the next availability times for a meeting page.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The path for the meeting page that you want the available times for.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Return times in response based on specified time zone.

parameters.name: monthOffset
parameters.description: Get times for a different month.

get.description: Get details about the initial information necessary for a meeting scheduler.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The path to the scheduling page that you want the information for.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Return times in response based on specified time zone.

hs_activity_type.description: The activity type of the meeting. Acceptable values are based on portal defined call and meeting types.

hs_internal_meeting_notes.description: Internal notes related to the meeting.

hs_meeting_body.description: The description of the meeting and calendar event.

hs_meeting_end_time.description: The time that the meeting should end in ISO 8601 format.

hs_meeting_location.description: The physical address, virtual location, or phone number where the meeting will take place.

hs_meeting_location_type.description: The type of location for the meeting. Acceptable values are: ADDRESS, CUSTOM, PHONE.

hs_meeting_outcome.description: The outcome of the meeting. Acceptable default values are: SCHEDULED, COMPLETED, RESCHEDULED, NO_SHOW, CANCELED. This property can be changed to include additional custom values.

hs_meeting_start_time.description: The time that the meeting should start in ISO 8601 format.

hs_meeting_title.description: The title of the meeting and calendar event.

hs_timestamp.description: The time that the meeting should start in ISO 8601 format. This value should be the same as `hs_meeting_start_time`.

hubspot_owner_id.description: The ownerId of the HubSpot user who will host the meeting.

duration.description: The duration of the meeting in milliseconds.

email.description: The email address of the person booking the meeting.

firstName.description: The first name of the person booking the meeting.

lastName.description: The last name of the person booking the meeting.

locale.description: The locale used for formatting dates and times in the meeting booking.

slug.description: The unique path identifier for the meeting page.

startTime.description: The date and time when the meeting is scheduled to start, in ISO 8601 format.

timezone.description: The timezone in which the meeting is scheduled.

endMillisUtc.description: The end time of the meeting availability, represented as Unix time in milliseconds.

startMillisUtc.description: The start time of the meeting availability, represented as Unix time in milliseconds.

availability.description: An array containing the closed range availability for a meeting link. Closed range times are provided as minute offsets from midnight (e.g., 540 corresponds to 9am).

customAvailabilityEndDate.description: The end date for a meeting link's custom availability window, represented as Unix time in milliseconds.

customAvailabilityStartDate.description: The start date for a meeting link's custom availability window, represented as Unix time in milliseconds.

language.description: The language setting used for the meeting link.

legalConsentEnabled.description: Whether the legal consent checkbox is displayed during meeting booking.

locale.description: The locale setting used for formatting dates and times in the meeting link.

location.description: The physical or virtual location where the meeting will take place.

meetingBufferTime.description: The minimum buffer time in milliseconds between consecutive meetings.

ownerPrioritized.description: Indicates whether the meeting owner is prioritized during booking. Only applies to link types of ROUND_ROBIN.

redirectUrl.description: The URL to redirect to after a meeting is booked.

startTimeIncrementMinutes.description: The increment for available start times of meetings, spelt out as a word (e.g. 15 minute increment corresponds to `FIFTEEN`). `MEETING_DURATION` is also a valid value.

weeksToAdvertise.description: Legacy property that indicates the number of weeks in advance that availability is advertised. May be outdated or superseded by other properties.

end.description: The end value of the closed range, represented as an integer.

start.description: The start value of the closed range, represented as an integer.

isOffline.description: Whether the meeting was booked offline, meaning no associated calendar event was created.

linkId.description: The unique identifier for the meeting link.

linkType.description: The type of the meeting link. Accepted values are: GROUP_CALENDAR, PERSONAL_LINK, ROUND_ROBIN_CALENDAR.

hasMore.description: Whether there are more available meeting times beyond the returned set.

linkAvailabilityByDuration.description: Available booking slots for the meeting, grouped by the duration.

end.description: The end time of the time range, represented as Unix time in milliseconds.

start.description: The start time of the time range, represented as Unix time in milliseconds.

canAddGuests.description: Indicates whether guests can be added to the meeting.

maxGuestCount.description: The maximum number of guests that can be added to the meeting.

fieldType.description: The specific input type of the form field. Corresponds to property types (e.g., `select`, `radio`, `date`, etc).

isCustom.description: Whether the form field is a custom field.

label.description: The text label associated with the form field.

name.description: The name identifier for the form field, includes underscores in place of spaces (e.g., the label `my form` is converted to `my_form`).

translatedLabel.description: The translated text label for the form field.

value.description: The value associated with the form field.

valueLabel.description: The text label associated to a form field selection or option.

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

name.description: The name of the form field.

value.description: The value associated with the form field.

description.description: A brief description displayed the welcome screen below the title.

logoUrl.description: The URL of the logo image to be displayed on the welcome screen, only used if `useCompanyLogo` is false.

showWelcomeScreen.description: Deprecated property. Value can be ignored but will always be false.

title.description: The main heading displayed on the welcome screen.

useCompanyLogo.description: Whether the company's logo should be displayed on the welcome screen.

timezone.description: The timezone property that will be set on the meeting event.

fieldType.description: The specific field type of the form field. Corresponds to property types (e.g., `select`, `radio`, `date`, etc)

isCustom.description: Whether the form field is a custom field.

isRequired.description: Whether the form field is mandatory.

label.description: The text label for the form field.

name.description: The name identifier for the form field.

type.description: The data type of the form field accepts (e.g. `date`, `enumeration`,  etc)

email.description: The email address of the user.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

fullName.description: The full name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the meeting event was initially created, in ISO 8601 format.

id.description: The unique identifier for the meeting event.

lastUpdatedAt.description: The date and time when the meeting event was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

calendarProvider.description: The calendar provider associated with the user. Accepted values are: GOOGLE, OFFICE365, EXCHANGE, UNKNOWN.

id.description: The ID for the meetings user. This value is different than the userId.

isSalesStarter.description: Whether the user has a sales starter seat.

accent2Color.description: The secondary accent color used in branding.

accentColor.description: The primary accent color used in branding.

companyAddressLine1.description: The first line of the company's address.

companyAddressLine2.description: The second line of the company's address.

companyAvatar.description: The URL of the company's avatar image.

companyCity.description: The city where the company is located.

companyCountry.description: The country where the company is located.

companyDomain.description: The domain of the company's website.

companyState.description: The state where the company is located.

companyZip.description: The ZIP code of the company's location.

logoAltText.description: The alternative text for the current logo.

logoHeight.description: The height of the logo in pixels.

logoUrl.description: The URL of a custom logo image.

logoWidth.description: The width of the logo in pixels.

primaryColor.description: The primary color used in branding.

secondaryColor.description: The secondary color used in branding.

showMarketingAd.description: Whether Hubspot Marketing ads are shown.

showSalesAd.description: Whether Hubspot Sales ads are shown.

shouldIncludeInviteDescription.description: Whether the invite description should be included in the reminder.

id.description: The unique identifier for an object.

PublicObjectId.description: Contains the Id of a Public Object

numberOfTimeUnits.description: The number of timeUnits prior to the meeting start when the reminder will be sent.

timeUnit.description: Accepted values are: WEEKS, DAYS, HOURS, MINUTES.

total.description: The total number of meeting links available.

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets

links.description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

hs_activity_type.description: The activity type of the meeting. Acceptable values are based on portal defined call and meeting types.

hs_engagement_source.description: The source of the engagement, will always be `MEETINGS`.

hs_engagement_source_id.description: The ID associated with the process created the engagement. Should always be empty when creating meeting events through this API.

hs_include_description_in_reminder.description: Whether to include the meeting description in the reminder.

hs_internal_meeting_notes.description: Internal notes related to the meeting.

hs_meeting_body.description: The description of the meeting and calendar event.

hs_meeting_end_time.description: The end time of the meeting in ISO 8601 format.

hs_meeting_external_url.description: The calendar event URL for the meeting.

hs_meeting_location.description: The physical address, virtual location, or phone number where the meeting will take place.

hs_meeting_location_type.description: The type of location for the meeting. Acceptable values are: ADDRESS, CUSTOM, PHONE.

hs_meeting_outcome.description: The outcome of the meeting. Acceptable default values are: SCHEDULED, COMPLETED, RESCHEDULED, NO_SHOW, CANCELED. This property can be changed to include additional custom values.

hs_meeting_start_time.description: The start time of the meeting in ISO 8601 format.

hs_meeting_title.description: The title of the meeting and calendar event.

hs_timestamp.description: The time that the meeting should start in ISO 8601 format. This value should be the same as `hs_meeting_start_time`.

hs_unique_id.description: The unique ID of the created calendar event.

hubspot_owner_id.description: The owner ID of the HubSpot user hosting the meeting.

description.description: A brief description of the option.

displayOrder.description: The order in which the option should be displayed.

hidden.description: Whether the option should be hidden from the user.

label.description: The text label for the option.

value.description: The value associated with the option.

bookingTimezone.description: The timezone the meeting was booked from.

calendarEventId.description: The unique identifier for the meeting's calendar event.

contactId.description: The ID of the contact associated to the meeting.

duration.description: The duration of the meeting in milliseconds.

end.description: The date and time when the meeting is scheduled to end, in ISO 8601 format.

isOffline.description: Whether the meeting was booked offline and no associated calendar event was created.

locale.description: The locale the meeting was booked with, used to determine date formatting in calendar event description.

location.description: The physical or virtual location where the meeting will take place.

start.description: The date and time when the meeting is scheduled to start, in ISO 8601 format.

subject.description: The title of the meeting and calendar event.

webConferenceMeetingId.description: The unique identifier for the web conference meeting.

webConferenceUrl.description: The URL for accessing the meeting's web conference.

meetingDurationMillis.description: The duration of the meeting in milliseconds.

avatar.description: The URL of the user's custom uploaded avatar image.

companyAvatar.description: The URL of the company's avatar image.

headline.description: Deprecated field with no impact of link display info.

publicDisplayAvatarOption.description: Option for determining which avatar to display on scheduling page. Accepted values are: PROFILE_IMAGE, COMPANY_LOGO, CUSTOM_AVATAR,

associationCategory.description: The category of the association, such as "HUBSPOT_DEFINED".

associationTypeId.description: The ID representing the specific type of association.

AssociationSpec.description: Defines the type, direction, and details of the relationship between two CRM objects.

communicationTypeId.description: The ID of communication consent form being recorded.

consented.description: Whether the user has given consent for the specified communication type.

communicationConsentText.description: The text that describes the consent for communication preferences.

isLegitimateInterest.description: Whether the legal basis for processing is legitimate interest.

legitimateInterestLegalBasis.description: The legal basis for processing under legitimate interest. Accepted values are: LEGITIMATE_INTEREST_PQL, LEGITIMATE_INTEREST_CLIENT, PERFORMANCE_OF_CONTRACT, CONSENT_WITH_NOTICE, NON_GDPR, PROCESS_AND_STORE, LEGITIMATE_INTEREST_OTHER.

privacyPolicyText.description: The text that describes the data processing privacy policy.

processingConsentCheckboxLabel.description: The label for the checkbox used to obtain consent for data processing.

processingConsentFooterText.description: The footer text accompanying the consent for data processing. This field is not used by the meeting platform and will always be empty.

processingConsentText.description: The text that describes the consent for processing personal data.

processingConsentType.description: The type of consent required for processing. Accepted values are: IMPLICIT, REQUIRED_CHECKBOX.

createdAt.description: The Unix time in milliseconds when the meeting link was created.

defaultLink.description: Whether the meeting link is the user's default link.

id.description: The unique identifier for the meeting link.

link.description: The URL of the meeting link.

name.description: The name of the meeting link.

organizerUserId.description: The user ID of the meeting link's organizer.

slug.description: The slug of the meeting link, located directly after the domain in the URL.

type.description: The type of the external meeting link. Accepted values are: PERSONAL_LINK, GROUP_CALENDAR, ROUND_ROBIN_CALENDAR.

updatedAt.description: The Unix time in milliseconds when the meeting link was last updated.

communicationTypeId.description: The ID of the communication consent form being recorded.

label.description: The text label describing the consent being given.

required.description: Whether the consent checkbox is required.

after.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving subsequent pages.

link.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve the next page results.

NextPage.description: Specifies the paging information needed to retrieve the next set of results in a paginated API response

scopes.crm.objects.companies.sensitive.write.v2: Create or update sensitive properties on company records
scopes.crm.objects.contacts.sensitive.write.v2: Create or update sensitive properties on contact records
scopes.crm.objects.deals.sensitive.write.v2: Create or update sensitive properties on deal records
